content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for considering my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest price possible. I am a student, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible, I am confident that we can reach an agreement.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for understanding my position, Aziz. While I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant, I am also looking to maximize my gains as the landlord. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe that a rental price of 750 euros per month is reasonable. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I can agree to 750 euros per month. Thank you for considering my proposal. I am happy to sign the lease agreement immediately.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Aziz. I agree to the rental price of 750 euros per month. Please sign the lease agreement as soon as possible and let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
